languages.text: "Не успели мы узнать, что Лорд-инквизитор покинул свое теплое местечко на Футфоле, как и вы собираетесь в долгую дорогу". {n}Ризза довольно ухмыляется.{/n} "Решила — а что не повидать {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}стар{mf|ого|ую} знаком{mf|ца|ую}{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: "Не успели мы узнать, что Инквизитор покинул свое теплое местечко на Футфоле, как тут новое событие — теперь вы заявились." {n}Ризза довольно ухмыляется.{/n} "Решила — а что не повидать стар{mf|ого|ую} знаком{mf|ца|ую}?"
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Не успели мы узнать, что Лорд-инквизитор покинул свое теплое местечко на Футфоле, как и вы собираетесь в долгую дорогу". {n}Ризза довольно ухмыляется.{/n} "Решила — а что не повидать {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}стар{mf|ого|ую} знаком{mf|ца|ую}{/d}?"

traits.locale_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cozy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come see an old acquaintance."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.locale_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

traits.locale_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “我们刚刚才得知，大审判官大人离开了他在落脚港舒服的小窝，现在连你也要走了。”{n}莱萨安心地笑了起来。{/n}“我还是来见我的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}老熟人{/d}一面吧。”
languages.original_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."

traits.locale_text: “我们刚刚才得知，审判长大人离开了他在落脚港舒服的小窝，现在连你也要走了。”{n}莱萨安心地笑了起来。{/n}“我还是来见我的老熟人一面吧。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターがフットフォールから去ったという速報が入ったばかりだというのに、あなたも長旅に出てしまうんですね」{n}リザは満足気に微笑んだ。{/n}「ちょっと立ち寄って、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}古い知人{/d}の顔を見ておこうと思ったんですよ」
languages.original_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターがフットフォールから去ったという速報が入ったばかりだというのに、あなたも長旅に出てしまうんですね」{n}リザは満足気に微笑んだ。{/n}「ちょっと立ち寄って、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}古い知人{/d}の顔を見ておこうと思ったんですよ」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Acabamos de recibir la noticia de que el Lord Inquisidor ha abandonado Paso y ahora usted también se marcha a enfrentarse a un largo viaje». {n}Ryzza sonríe con satisfacción.{/n} «Se me ocurrió que podía pasarme a visitar a un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}viej{mf|o|a} amig{mf|o|a}{/d}».
languages.original_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."

traits.locale_text: «Acabamos de recibir la noticia de que el Lord Inquisidor ha abandonado Paso y ahora usted también se marcha a enfrentarse a un largo viaje». {n}Ryzza sonríe con satisfacción.{/n} «Se me ocurrió que podía pasarme a visitar a un{mf||a} viej{mf|o|a} amig{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Wir haben eben erst erfahren, dass der Großinquisitor seine komfortable Position auf Footfall verlassen hat, und nun brecht auch Ihr zu einer langen Reise auf." {n}Ryzza grinst zufrieden.{/n} "Ich dachte, ich komme vorbei, um eine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}alte Bekanntschaft{/d} zu sehen."
languages.original_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben eben erst erfahren, dass der Großinquisitor seine komfortable Position auf Footfall verlassen hat, und nun brecht auch Ihr zu einer langen Reise auf." {n}Ryzza grinst zufrieden.{/n} "Ich dachte, ich komme vorbei, um eine alte Bekanntschaft zu sehen."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « À peine apprenons-nous que le seigneur inquisiteur a quitté son nid douillet à Castel que vous vous envolez vous aussi pour un long voyage, {n}déclare en Ryzza souriant, l'air satisfait.{/n} Je me suis dit que je pourrais en profiter pour voir une {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}vieille connaissance{/d}. »
languages.original_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."

traits.locale_text: « À peine apprenons-nous que le seigneur inquisiteur a quitté son nid douillet à Castel que vous vous envolez vous aussi pour un long voyage, {n}déclare en Ryzza souriant, l'air satisfait.{/n} Je me suis dit que je pourrais en profiter pour voir une vieille connaissance. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun Binliman'daki konforlu konağını terk ettiği haberini daha yeni aldık, üstüne sen de uzun bir yolculuğa çıkıyorsun." {n}Ryzza, hoş bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}Eski dostumu{/d} gelip göreyim istedim."
languages.original_text: "We barely got the news that the Lord Inquisitor had left his cosy Footfall perch, and now you're off on a long journey, too." {n}Ryzza grins contentedly.{/n} "Thought I might as well come to see an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}old acquaintance{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun Binliman'daki konforlu konağını terk ettiği haberini daha yeni aldık ve şimdi de sen uzun bir yolculuğa çıkıyorsun." {n}Ryzza hoş bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_RyzzaAlive}Eski tanıdığımı{/d} gelip bir göreyim istedim."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4
